post:
Hello  LET users,


I would like to present you the new website for [www.ShockVPS.com](https://www.shockvps.com). 

We use only **KVM technology** for virtualization which provides guaranteed/dedicated hardware on the virtual machines. 

We have low latency nodes all around Europe. Also, all our servers have 100% SSD storage. 
Our main goal is to provide Shocking Fast VPS Hosting ( fast servers and fast network).


**Main Features:**


Instant Setup

KVM Virtualization

Solid State Drives

Multiple locations

24/7 Support

**LowEndTalk Special Offers:**


**KVM 512MB**

1 vCores 

512MB RAM 

10GB SSD space 

2TB Bandwidth 

1Gbps connection 

1 IPv4 addresses 

1 IPv6 addresses 

Monthly price: 3.49€/mo
